DOC.brief_summary: Atomoxetine versus placebo Children Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD )
DOC.brief_title: Atomoxetine Versus Placebo Children With Attention Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD )
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose ADHD Patients must able swallow capsule Patients must normal intelligence Patients weigh less 15 kg 75 kg Patients organic brain disease ( example , dementia traumatic brain injury residual )
